00036 MSHR_H::MSHR_H()
00037 {
00038     unsink = 0;
00039     globalUnSink = 0;
00040     lastFinishTime = 0; 
00041     done = 0;
00042     lastScheduledIndex = 0;     
00043     mshr.clear();
00044     writeQueue.clear();
00045     waiting = false;
00046     lastFullTime = 0;   
00047     countOnce.resize(no_mcs);
00048     for(uint i=0; i<no_mcs; i++)
00049         countOnce[i].resize(NO_OF_BANKS);
00050 }

00219         cout << "I should never come in else of MSHR" << endl;  
00220     delete (Request*)e->event_data.at(0);       
00221     delete e;

00223 
00224 extern unsigned int THREAD_BITS_POSITION;
00225 Addr_t MSHR_H::GlobalAddrMap(Addr_t addr, UInt threadId)
00226 {
00227     Addr_t newAddr;
00228     unsigned long int threadBits = (unsigned long int)ceil(log2(NO_OF_THREADS));
00229     unsigned long int threadBitsPos = THREAD_BITS_POSITION;
00230     Addr_t lowerMask = (Addr_t)pow(2.0,threadBitsPos*1.0)-1;
00231     unsigned long long int upperMask = 0xFFFFFFFF << threadBitsPos;
00232     Addr_t lowerAddr = addr & lowerMask;
00233     Addr_t upperAddr = addr & upperMask;
00234     Addr_t threadAddr = (threadId & ((Addr_t)pow(2.0,threadBits*1.0)-1));
00235     newAddr = lowerAddr | (threadAddr << threadBitsPos)| (upperAddr << threadBits);
00236 //    cout << hex << addr << ", " << threadId << ", " << newAddr << endl;       
00237     return newAddr;
00238 }

00240 void MSHR_H::DeleteInMSHR(Request* req)
00241 {
00242     vector<Request>::iterator index = mshr.begin();
00243     for (unsigned int i=0; i<mshr.size(); i++)
00244     {
00245         if ( (mshr[i].address == req->address) && (mshr[i].mcNo == req->mcNo) )
00246         {       
00247             lastScheduledIndex--;               
00248             mshr.erase(i+index);
00249             //((GenericTPG*)parent)->roundTripLat += (Simulator::Now() - mshr[i].startTime);     
00250             ((GenericTPGVcs*)parent)->roundTripLat += ((ullint)Simulator::Now() - req->startTime);       
00251 #ifdef DEBUG
00252             cout << endl << Simulator::Now() << hex << ": Deletion Time of Request " 
00253                 << req->address << dec << ", of Thread " << id << ", " << req->mcNo << ", " << lastScheduledIndex 
00254                 << " ready:" << ((GenericTPGVcs*)parent)->ready[0] << endl;
00255 #endif  
00256              break;
00257         }
00258      }
00259      cout << dec;       
00260 }

00262 unsigned int MSHR_H::countBLP(Request req)
00263 {
00264     unsigned int count = 0;             
00265     for (unsigned int i=0; i<no_mcs; i++)
00266     {
00267 //      BoolVector *temp = countOnce[i]; 
00268         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_BANKS; j++)
00269         {
00270              countOnce[i][j] = false;
00271         }
00272     }                   
00273     for (unsigned int i=0; i<lastScheduledIndex; i++)
00274     {
00275         if (!countOnce[mshr[i].mcNo][mshr[i].bankNo])
00276         {
00277             countOnce[mshr[i].mcNo][mshr[i].bankNo] = true;     
00278             count++;
00279         }
00280     }
00281 //    cout << lastScheduledIndex << "saji " << count << endl;                   
00282     return count;       
00283 }

00285 void MSHR_H::demap_addr(Addr_t oldAddress, Addr_t newAddress)
00286 {
00287     vector<Request>::iterator index = mshr.begin();
00288     for (unsigned int i=0; i<mshr.size(); i++)
00289     {
00290         if (mshr[i].address == oldAddress)
00291         {
00292             mshr[i].address = newAddress;
00293 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00294             cout << Simulator::Now() << hex << ": Replace Address " << oldAddress << " in MSHR of Thread " << id << " to " << mshr[i].address << endl;
00295 #endif  
00296             //cout << hex <<  oldAddress << " hihi " << newAddress << endl;
00297              break;
00298         }
00299      }
00300 
00301 }
00302 
00303 short int 
00304 MSHR_H::map_addr(unsigned long long int *addr)
00305 {
00306     unsigned int temp = MC_ADDR_BITS;   
00307     unsigned int temp2 = temp-(int)log2(no_mcs);   
00308     unsigned int lower_mask = (uint)pow(2.0,temp2*1.0)-1;
00309     unsigned long long int upper_mask = (ullint)((0xFFFFFFFF)-(pow(2.0,temp*1.0)-1));
00310     unsigned int lower_addr = (*addr) & lower_mask;
00311     unsigned long long int upper_addr = ((*addr) & upper_mask) >> (int)log2(no_mcs);
00312 
00313 #ifdef GLOBAL_XOR
00314     short int tempBits = (int)log2(NO_OF_THREADS) - (int)log2(no_mcs);
00315     short int tempFactor = ((id >> tempBits) & (no_mcs-1));
00316     short int mc_addr = (((*addr) >> temp2) & (no_mcs-1)) ^ tempFactor;
00317 #else    
00318     short int mc_addr = ((*addr) >> temp2) & (no_mcs-1);
00319 #endif
00320 
00321 //    *addr = upper_addr | lower_addr;
00322     return mc_addr;
00323 }

00325 void MSHR_H::local_map_addr(Request* req)
00326 {
00327         req->lowerBits = req->address & COLUMN_SIZE;
00328         //TODO needs to set this
00329         req->channelNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_CHANNELS)) ) & (NO_OF_CHANNELS-1);       
00330                                                                                         // Masking higher bits to find channel No;
00331 
00332 #ifdef PAGE_INTERLEAVING                // equivalent to l:r:b:c:v      As defined by Bruce Jacob's book.   c:v = n:z
00333 
00334         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1);// Masking lower bits to find Column No.
00335         req->bankNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);       // Masking the next b bits after page bits
00336         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);// Masking the next r bits  
00337         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00338                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits  
00339 #endif
00340 
00341 #ifdef PERMUTATION                      // equivalent to l:r:(b xor tlower):c:v
00342 
00343         Addr_t temp;
00344         Addr_t temp2;   
00345         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1);// Masking lower bits to find Column No.
00346         temp = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);              // Masking the next b bits after page bits
00347         temp2 = (req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1); // Masking lower b bits of the tag
00348         req->bankNo = temp ^ temp2;     
00349         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);// Masking the next r bits  
00350         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00351                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits  
00352 #endif
00353 
00354 #ifdef CACHELINE_INTERLEAVING           // equivalent to l:r:n:b:z      
00355         
00356         Addr_t temp;
00357         Addr_t temp2;   
00358         temp = (req->address & (CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1)) >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);// Masking upper z bits only and leaving bits of the col
00359         req->bankNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1); // Masking the next b bits after cache block bits
00360         temp2 = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (BLOCKS_PER_ROW-1);// Masking next n bits 
00361 //TODO I think this line is incorrect should be temp2 << ((int)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1)-log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) | temp;
00362         req->columnNo = (temp2 << ((Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE))) | temp;
00363 //      req->columnNo = (temp2 >> (CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1) ) | temp;
00364         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);// Masking the next r bits  
00365         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00366                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits
00367 #endif
00368 
00369 #ifdef SWAPPING                                 // equivalent to l:(rupper:n:rlower):b:(rmiddle):z //(v+clower) n is put in lower tag bits
00370         
00371         unsigned short n = log2(BLOCKS_PER_ROW);                // n is a design parameter, should be changed to explore 
00372         Addr_t nMask = BLOCKS_PER_ROW-1;
00373         Addr_t colMask;
00374         Addr_t rowMask;
00375         Addr_t temp;
00376         Addr_t temp2;
00377         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1);        // Masking lower bits to find req->columnNo temporarily
00378         req->bankNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);       // Masking the next b bits after page bits
00379         req->rowNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)) ) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);  
00380                                                                         // Masking the next r bits to find req->rowNo temporarily
00382         temp = ((req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-n)) & nMask) << ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS-(Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS));
00383         temp2 = ((req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS)) & nMask) << ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-n); 
00384                                                                                 // Rip the required bits out from req->address
00385         cout << hex << temp << "        " << temp2 << "    " << req->rowNo << "   " << req->columnNo << endl;
00386         colMask = nMask << ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-n);          // Shift the mask to required bit position
00387         rowMask = nMask << ((Addr_t)log2(DRAM_SIZE)-TAG_BITS-(Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)-(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)); 
00388         cout << colMask << "  " <<  rowMask << endl;
00389         req->columnNo = (req->columnNo & (~colMask)) | temp2;   // Make the required bit position of column zero & or with temp2
00390         req->columnNo = req->columnNo >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);     // Remove the lower z bits from column no       
00391         req->rowNo = (req->rowNo & (~rowMask)) | temp;
00392         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00393                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits
00394 #endif  
00395 
00396 #ifdef GENERIC          // l:r:b:c:v    User should swap these around to find a good result
00397 
00399         Addr_t zbits = (req->address & (CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE-1)); //>> (int)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);      
00400         Addr_t nbits = ( (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)) & (BLOCKS_PER_ROW-1) ) << (Addr_t)log2(CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE);
00401         Addr_t bbits = ( (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1) ) << (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE);
00402         Addr_t rbits = ( (req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS))) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1) ) 
00403                                     << ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS));
00404         Addr_t lbits = ( (req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1) )
00405                                     <<  ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS));// Masking next l bits
00407 //      cout << zbits << " " << nbits << endl; 
00408         req->columnNo = (zbits | nbits) >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE);   // Oring lower and removing column bits to find Column No
00409         req->bankNo = bbits >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE);          // Taking bbits shifting to LSBs
00410         req->rowNo = rbits >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)); // Taking rbits and shifting to LSBs
00411         req->rankNo = lbits >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)); // Taking lbits and shifting to LSBs
00412 #endif
00413 
00414 #ifdef NO_SCHEME                                // no scheme   equivalent to l:b:r:c:v
00415 
00416         req->columnNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(COLUMN_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_COLUMNS-1);// Masking lower bits to find Column No.
00417         req->rowNo = (req->address >> (Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)) & (NO_OF_ROWS-1);         // Masking the next r bits       
00418         req->bankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_BANKS-1);  // Masking the next b bits
00419         req->rankNo = ( req->address >> ((Addr_t)log2(ROW_SIZE)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_BANKS)+(Addr_t)log2(NO_OF_ROWS)) ) & (NO_OF_RANKS-1);  
00420                                                                                                         // Masking next l bits 
00421 #endif
00422 }
